title: Latino Activism and the Civil Rights Movement

content.question: Mexican American activism in the 1950s and 1960s was most directly inspired by which of the following?

choices.label: The tactics and goals of the African American Civil Rights movement
The emergence of evangelical Christian political activism
The arguments made by conservatives about the role of the federal government
The public reaction against antiwar protesters

content.answer: The tactics and goals of the African American Civil Rights movement

skill.text: Skill 5.B: Explain how a historical development or process relates to another historical development or process.
